doc:
Christopher Pettiet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Pettiet 0 Christopher Lee Pettiet often referred to as Chris Pettiet (February 12, 1976 – April 12, 2000) was an American television and film actor best known for his role as Jesse James in the Western TV series The Young Riders and as Zach Crandell in the cult comedy film Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead (1991). Christopher_Lee_Pettiet often referred to as Chris_Pettiet ( February_12_,_1976 – April_12_,_2000 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor best known for his_role as Jesse_James in the_Western_TV_series The_Young_Riders and as Zach_Crandell in the_cult_comedy_film Do_n't_Tell Mom the_Babysitter 's_Dead ( 1991 ) .
